name: Matthew Buzzi
comment: Amazing build quality, design, and upgradability. Its way oversized for a laptop though.

name: Edward G. Dorman
comment: I remember back in the day these specs were cutting edge but now it's just your average gaming desktop in a laptop.

name: Kenneth F. Smith
comment: Ah yes. A laptop that can run minecraft at unlimited fps without causing a thermo-nuclear explosion.

name: Dana T. Ward
comment: Kinda amazing that you can get this kind of performance from way lighter and thinner laptops now, which might even be cheaper

name: Kristin H. Lee
comment: Oh my god how far has technology come in 4 years ?? Today's laptops you get for a fraction of the price , are faster and you can carry it around with a backpack . This is hilariously chunky !

name: Pamela M. Montgomery
comment: The Surface Laptop port situation really isn't much better than the M1 Macs. Meh, the port situation isn't a big deal.
